record.description: College Residence Halls for Men. Standing: Hayford (N.U.), Wilkins (M.S.C.), Millizen (Ill. Eng.), Flook (U of C), Rogalsky (Cornell), President Seaton (Albion), Watson (U of C), Blackwell (Wash. U.), McClelland (Knox), Wagoner (Ball State), Cain (F.A.S.), Sensing (Peabody), Ford (M.I.T), Meyer (Center Coll.), Jackson (Davidson Coll.), Wilson (Ft. Hayes, Kan.). Seated: Davenport (M.S.C.), Morey (U of Ill.), Erwin (Stanford), Wells (N.U.), Croft (U of BFO), Graham (Winthrop Coll.), Christenson (U of Mich.), and Mather (U of C.)
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
